fact: In Squid Game Season 3's finale, the real game is played by viewers, who realize they've been contestants all along, underestimating their choices.
reply: Guess who just lost the game without knowing it? Yep, you. Better luck next season!
youtube_description: Squid Game S3 flips reality! You've been playing all along. Mind blown yet? #SquidGame #Netflix #plotwist #mindblown
